author: vors
body:
Resolves #1005 

`TestRunspaceWithPowerShellAndInitialSessionState` [fails in CI](https://travis-ci.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/jobs/42210737), but I cannot repro it locally.
Will open a separate issue for it.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: @andschwa I will keep it `LINUX` for now and your note to a relevant porting bug #1042

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @vors did this fix the failing filesystem provider tests too?

title: Re-enable xunit tests
